mapper.insert: INSERT INTO Client (client_id, client_secret, description, domain) VALUES (#{clientId}, #{clientSecret}, #{description}, #{domain})
mapper.select: select client_id , client_secret , description , domain from Client where client_id = #{param1}

select a.client_id , a.client_secret , a.description , a.domain from Client a where a.client_id in (select distinct aa.client_id from UserClientScope aa where aa.user_id in (select aaa.user_id from Token aaa where aaa.token_id = #{tokenId}) and aa.scope_id = 'Admin' and aa.client_id != 'gauth') or exists (select 1 from Token aaa where aaa.token_id = #{tokenId} and aaa.user_id = 'admin' and 'gauth' != a.client_id)
